activities: We make project and data management software for international development organizations. Rarely, but sometimes, these organizations report data that includes the names of program beneficiaries. We also somtimes have the name, phone number, and email for some people who work in the U.K. and/or EU, as they are users of the system and they have profile pages in our software.
personaldata: For 'personal data' - our clients collect and enter data in our software that includes unique identifiers of beneficiaries. We also have the name, phone number, and email for system users. For 'processed information,' we have some clients push beneficiary data directly our software.
privacyprograms: We have an Information Security Program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
